dict.acceptation: 理解，懂得；熟知，通晓；获知，理解；谅解；
理解，懂得；表示同情或谅解；据说；
能谅解的；宽容的；通情达理的；

sent.orig: Document processing includes two stages: document layout understanding and OCR recognition.
sent.trans: 文档图像自动处理主要包括文档图像的版面理解(Document Layout Understanding)和OCR识别。

sent.orig: The understanding, the harmony, the approval, the tacit understanding, the mountain stream wells up swings.
sent.trans: 理解、和谐、认同、默契，溪水般涌荡开来。

sent.orig: Obtaining a general understanding of the brain and its functions important to understanding the rehabilitation process.
sent.trans: 对脑袋及其功能有基本的认识可以帮助我们理解康复的过程。

sent.orig: Don't worry people understanding you, worry about understanding others.
sent.trans: 不患人之不己知，患不知人也。

sent.orig: Arguing against something needs understanding first, and conquering something needs understanding it first.
sent.trans: 要反对必须先了解，要征服必须先了解。
